title: Anwar Sports Arena
longDescription: A versatile and elegant event venue perfect for weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations. Our spacious arena features excellent lighting, climate control, and modern amenities. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we provide the perfect backdrop for your special moments.

courts.name: Grand Event Hall
courts.desc: Our stunning event hall is perfect for weddings, receptions, birthday parties, corporate events, and celebrations. Features professional lighting, sound system, climate control, and spacious layout for memorable occasions.

eventTypes.weddings: Perfect for wedding ceremonies and receptions
